title: waitStep
examples:
- step:
    type: Wait
    name: Wait
    identifier: wait_1
    spec:
      duration: 10s

description.desc: The description of your step objective. You can add details about where someone can utilise this step.

identifier.desc: The unique identifier of your step inside a stage / step group. Harness utilise the identifier for all expressions. If you omit `identifier`, harness auto generates with a unique combination.

type.desc: For more information, see [`available steps in harness`](https://developer.harness.io/docs/category/general-cd).

properties.desc: The maximum duration to let a step wait before it gets move to next step. Default`:` 10m.
